items.sentence: Tom put together one million dollars in unmarked, used bills as the kidnappers had told him to do.
Tom told Mary that he thought a hippopotamus could run at a speed of about 30 kilometers per hour.
The police have been searching Tom\'s house for three hours, but they haven\'t found anything yet.
Tom adapted last year\'s lesson plans so he could use them with this year\'s lower level students.
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
